Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The ± 2,398 SF office condo is situated on approximately 4.21 acres. The suite features an open floor plan with two (2) private offices and two (2) in-suite, wash rooms with sink and shower. The complex has two (2) entrances in the back and the front. Amenities include a common area lobby and restrooms. The previous usage was for private personal training sessions. This property is ideally located with quick access to major thoroughfares – making large employers, business, shopping centers, and fine restaurants just minutes away.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
27877 Clemens Rd. is located in Westlake, OH, one of the most attractive suburbs of Cleveland. There is a solid mix of multi-family, office, and industrial space within the community which has allowed Westlake to evolve into a very desirable location with 
unique provisions like Crocker Park.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This well maintained single story office condo is nestled in a very attractive business area off of Clemens Rd. Your neighbors include a number of balanced businesses like Hyland Software, American Greetings, Henkel Corp., Cuyahoga Community College, University Hospitals, Fastners Corp of America and Equity Trust. Being situated in close proximity to I-90 makes the building easily accessible to the west and east as well as downtown Cleveland.
